law.text: The Labor Cabinet shall report monthly to the Committee on Appropriations and Revenue its monthly expenditures of restricted agency funds and the nature of such expenditures. Separate reporting shall be done by each office within the Labor Cabinet and for general administration and support.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1802, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 181, Part 3, sec. 13, effective April 4, 1994. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 437, Pt. II, J, sec. 44(1), (2), effective April 15, 1988.
